name: Lofi Bubblewrap to Pop and Relax to
name_original: Lofi Bubblewrap to Pop and Relax to
description:
Pop bubble wrap endlessly in Free Mode, or play the Campaign for 80 levels of variety!

This is a simple prototype, however I really want to flesh it out with more levels and perhaps even more mechanics!!! I can only do this however, if people actually WANT me to keep working this game. Leaving any comment at all really helps me know if this is something i should develop further!
